title: Coronation Street spoilers: Daniel collapses as Sinead dies
text:
Sinead Tinker’s (Katie McGlynn) condition worsened during Coronation Street tonight, and matters weren’t helped when she discovered husband Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) had kissed Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon). As a result of the discovery, she kicked Daniel out and, he ended up hitting rock-bottom — as he collapsed by the canal.

Tensions were high between Daniel and Sinead during Monday night’s episodes, as Daniel made clear how he felt about Craig (Colson Smith), Beth (Lisa George) and Kirk’s (Andrew Whyment) impromptu Christmas celebration.

Sinead wasn’t best pleased about her husband’s overprotectiveness, and as a result she told him to leave. Upset and emotional, Daniel was comforted by Bethany and the pair ended up sharing a kiss.

Tonight, Sinead discovered the truth, as she stumbled upon Bethany’s notebook in the search for her own. Curious, she proceeded to read Bethany’s short story, and came to the conclusion that she was in love with Daniel.

When Daniel returned home, Sinead confronted him with her discovery — and she told him how the short story demonstrates Bethany’s love for him. Daniel made every effort to deny such a claim, but Sinead begged him to be honest with her.

Eventually, Daniel complied, as he revealed he’d kissed Bethany. Sinead was understandably devastated once more and ordered him out — and Beth and Craig were quick to make their true feelings about what Daniel did known once they learned the truth.

Daniel began drinking, and Adam (Sam Robertson) did his best to talk him round, but it was ultimately no use — as he headed off on his own. Afterwards, Tracy (Kate Ford) and Peter (Chris Gascoyne) headed off in search of him.

The episode concluded as a drunk Daniel stumbled along the canal, and — with his vision beginning to fail him as a result of the amount of alcohol he’d consumed — he collapsed to the floor.

Sinead’s running out of time, so will Daniel manage to come to his senses and return home to see his dying wife before it’s too late?

The young woman will pass away at the end of the week, but will Tracy and Adam manage to track Daniel down in time?

Coronation Street continues on Thursday 24thOctober at 8:30pm.

description: Despite her having only a little bit of time left, Sinead learned of Daniel's betrayal with Bethany — and Daniel hit rock bottom.
